lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. adopted new rules regarding recruiting violations and scandals and will scrap its current enforcement structure of major and secondary violations.
snippet: The N.C.A.A. adopted new rules regarding recruiting violations and scandals and will scrap its current enforcement structure of major and secondary violations.
